stimulusHtml: Which of the following describes a unitary state?
choicesHtml: An ethnically homogeneous state where all citizens identify as members of the same nation
A state in which government decisions are made at the national level and applied uniformly across the state
A state in which one leader and one party have complete political, economic, and social control
A state in which subunits are granted independent constitutional authority
A state that is geographically contiguous with no fragmented land areas separated from the rest of the state
